name: gusplease
text: That last panel was why I couldn't keep a girlfriend for more than a few weeks during my freshman year.

name: nutmeg
text: A comment left by nutmeg was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by spandrelbot, hairymoonstone, Nictusempra)

name: dougthehead
text: Yeah, don't dismiss Ray's advice.  I've found that most girls respond to you better if you're less "thank you" and more "you're welcome."  Confidence is hella sexy.

name: heccibiggs
text: Very true. I can't imagine anything worse than someone thanking me for a kiss, ugh. Stop that. go back home to your mother.

name: spinynorman
text:
They could always pull a Nice Pete and draw back, look straight into your eyes, and scream in fury for like eight second straight.

I imagine that'd kill the mood.

name: 7th_shot
text: Well, at least the screaming shows full-speed-ahead insanity, and then maybe the dude'll turn out to do some interesting shit. I don't think guys understand just how unappealing and pitiful it is to be thanked for basic gestures of affection.

name: spinynorman
text:
Dudes got hella inadequacy. Sucks to believe you are undeserving of love or compassion.

All I want in a woman is the ability to pound a forty in under thirty seconds and then belch the words "FILL ME UP WITH YOUR LITTLE BABIES."

name: heccibiggs
text: Done and done.

name: spinynorman
text: The supreme irony, of course, is that Roast Beef, arguably the most-liked character in the strip, is exactly the kind of guy neither of you like.

name: iskander
text: Beef is an awesome character but I think he would be strident to be around in real life.

name: spinynorman
text:
That sounds like something Beef would probably say. :(

Poor Beef and Beef-like gentlemen.

name: boopy
text: as a  fairly beef-like gentleman, i can attest to how strident it can get.

name: tekende
text: I really like how heccibiggs basically just told you she would have sex with you and you pretty much just steamrolled her comment.

name: spinynorman
text:
Psssh, I did not personally see any forty-pounding or belching out desires of pregnancy

How do I know we are star crossed lovers without that

name: jollysaintpete
mercuri0us
text: Really, wow thanks for the advice.  Tell me, as a chick, do you on the whole prefer the Beefs or the Rays?

name: davidbowie
text: Mine says this now.

name: zzzleepy
text:
wow. what a moment. these two are friends.
plus a punchline. top 10, maybe 5.

this strip seems finely crafted and solidly built. doesn't it describe a lot about beef's perspective, ray's perspective, and their relationship?

name: overmedicated
text: I, too, have never frenched a girl.

name: overmedicated
text:
Or a boy.

Shit.

name: zefiel
text:
Aw, I too, thought I'd be accidentally shot by my best friend in a freak rollerskating incident and die before ever frenchin' a lady, but here I am, having already gotten mad rutty with a lady. What I mean to say inbetween all that bragging is, don't give up hope, man. It'll happen.

...Man, we could start a nerd support group/meeting thing.

name: hollis
text: A comment left by hollis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by stormypinkness, ezcmac, jdhenry105, blarghamagarky, Darthemed)

name: zefiel
text: Yes! Yes! Nerd Dating support group! I can see it starting! The slogan: Leave the Roast Beef Behind to unleash the King of the Makeouts inside you!

name: overmedicated
text:
Nerd Support Group Update:

I've had my first French!

And my second!

And third!

And fourth!

Then I got very drunk and had one with a dude.

It was my birthday, see.

And my jaw hurts.

Hooray!

name: zefiel
text: Hahah Awesome! Yeah, your jaw can get kinda sore until you get kinda used to it. Happy Belated Birthday. Were you lucid enough to remember Ray's advice and go 'You're welcome'?

name: overmedicated
text:
Oh, better than that mon ami. Not only did I say "You're welcome!" to all the girls afterwards, but I have some (admittedly wobbly) video footage of me snogging my (male) best friend then yelling "KISS MY ASS BITCH, I'LL BE AT DUANE'S!" and punching him out.

I have reached the zenith of human existance, I truly have.

name: zefiel
text: Oh No way that's dope this footage MUST make it to youtube.

name: m1st3rbl4ck
text: that is the actual greatest thing i have ever heard of, ever.

name: lereya
text: Fucking ayyyyy.

name: blarghamagarky
text: seriously post or shens

name: latterman
text:
The zenith of human existence, experts agree, is pretending to pretend (to the extent your space helmet allows you) to be frenchin' while on the moon and on the phone with a friend.

Of course, Roast Beef being a cat plays a hand in the wonderfully flat landing of whatever joke I tried to spill out of my fingertips here.

name: jhunter
text: i do not think i am overstating when i say that you are the single greatest person in existence

name: latterman
text:
What? What are you guys frenchin'? An alligator with braces?

People who french people ain't supposed to get pain in their jaws.

name: zefiel
text: You're not doing it right it seems

name: donnatron
text: Hell yes your jaw should hurt.

name: mattylite
text: Your avatar makes me think if I don't make a copy of it and give it to someone else, some girl with backwards hair is gonna crawl out of a well and then I'll be dead and the ground will be all wet.

name: dovey
text: Sometimes I get a sore jaw after I've been frenching a vagina for too long.

name: gouldgonewild
text: First of all, sore neck. Second of all, that's called an Australian kiss

name: johnnyrocker
text: If you're drunk and frenching everyone at a party? Yes it hurts your jaw after a while.

name: johnnyrocker
text:
Oh woops man I didn't even see this comment before.
Rock on.

name: charchar
text:
You know it just turn into a giant nerd love-fest and everybody would be yelling about their rad chilies being on fire.

My first kiss: he eventually honked my boob. Like a rubber duck. GUYS THIS IS NEVER OKAY, OKAY?

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Ouch. That is a memory-killer.

I remember mine, too. I simultaneously made out with a guy and flipped off my friend who was standing behind him.

Good times.

name: zefiel
text: HONK

name: mystkmanat
text: My first kiss was on a dare at a party.  The guy I kissed was my friend's boyfriend, who I was secretly in love with.  It was a strange, strange night.

name: boredom_man
text: LESS REMINISCING MORE BOOB-HONKING

name: mystkmanat
text: HONK HONK

name: tekende
text: You're right, it's not okay, it's actually awesome.

name: cdtm
text: I'm for a support group, if it includes non nerd losers, too.  And yeah, gotta keep your chin up.

name: lacrimus
text: If you don't you might end up kissing her chin.

name: theyang
text: french like death will happen.

name: johnnyrocker
text:
Dude, overmedicated, don't worry. I didn't have my first french until I was like 17. The girl who finally took my frenchinity, it turned out, had a boyfriend who was a black belt in judo. Two years later and I have frenched 5 different girls and gotten rutty with two.

Sometimes stuff isn't exciting but then BAM all this excitement at once. The important thing is to relax.

name: donnatron
text: Frenched yet? Just curious.

name: jamers
text: A comment left by jamers was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by stormypinkness, jdhenry105, blarghamagarky)

name: fuckyoufriday
text: It's essential that you suspend all thought of what you're actually doing for a make-out session to work. Same goes for sex.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: this makes total sense.

name: deancain29
text: class

name: qatipay
text: I have dated people who subscribed to this advice. There was no "Thank You" involved.

name: philosophe
text: No date, but yes.

name: lawdog
text: Ray understands. There is truly no finer warm up for "The Miracle"

name: lokier
text: Ray's "Ha Ha!" bothers me, like he doesn't have it together enough to just deliver the line.

name: atmus
text: I spend basically an hour each day trying to figure out the circumstances involved that would have me giving someone make-out advice in such away as to have them ask if they should say thank you, just so I can deliver Ray's line.

name: blarghamagarky
text: I imagine it as a triumphant and slightly aggressive "Ha Ha!"

name: saturnbeads
text:
Actually, the way Ray describes frenching is pretty unappealing to me. When dudes just try to go all nuts with their tongues it presses all my buttons, just.. the wrong ones. It should be more of a massage, I think, not like a rapid twisting and flapping. >_<

Beef is so adorable.

name: donnatron
text: Also, they should change it up. Fast, slow, sensual, hot...keep it interesting!

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ain't gonna read any of this shay on webmd.

name: ghede
text: Ze tongue, it should not thrash about in ze mouth, it should gently tease and twine.

name: pzukowski
text: It's like tongue wrestling when it's mutual.  You have to overcome the horror or touching someone else's tongue with yours.

name: mikeronomicon
text: I don't remember frenching working that way. I'm pretty sure my girlfriend would whoop my ass if I tried too. Might be worth it though.........

name: i_love_kate
text: How the hell is Beef talking if he cannot open his mouth.

name: gormster
text: I am glad I am not the only person who noticed this.

name: random_shorts
text:
I had to read to the very end to make sure no one had asked this very question.

I never get to make my comments. It's like everyone was reading this strip before me.

name: epicurus
text: And let's not forget that the phone is outside of his helmet. That raises some questions.

name: carlyle
text: Roast Beef is enetertained by thinking about his tongue going hella crazy.
